etomica.math.geometry

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.math.geometry.Polytope
      • etomica.math.geometry.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shape, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Parallelogram, PolygonGeneral, Rectangle, Square

    public abstract class Polygon
extends Polytope
    Representation of a mathematical polygon, a 2-dimensional polytope. Contains all information needed to represent a polygon, methods to set its position and orientation, and methods that return an external representation of it. Provides no external means to change the polygon size and shape, as the form and capabilities of mutator methods are particular to the type of polygon defined by the subclass.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
